Class Asteroid

java.lang.Object
GalaxyProjectFinal.Celestial
GalaxyProjectFinal.Asteroid
public class Asteroid extends Celestial
Class representing the details of a asteroid in a galaxy simulation. Defines the behavior of an asteroid, randomly places along the edges and moves inwards. Collisions may also occur and shows when colliding with other celestial bodies.

Project: GalaxyProjectFinal

Date: 6/18/2025

    • collidesWith

      public boolean collidesWith(Celestial other)
      Returns true if “this” asteroid overlaps the other Celestial. We treat “radius” = getSize()/2 for every object (Asteroid, Comet, Planet).
